name: I'm on a watcher duty 4: The community place
name_original: I'm on a watcher duty 4: The community place
description:
Note: This game was only made for fun and for people to enjoy. I didn't own the community or anything ok? I only made games for fun. Plus, I like these communities but I didn't really interact with them that much.

This time, we're in the community place. The place where people that like these community will be gathered. However, these community places are being haunted by anomalies and it's your job to take a care of it. Good luck fellow watcher.

MMD Model credits:

Montecore & Predator - Yuuka model

雪萱 - Star Sapphire model

えと - Daiyousei and Cirno model

Sketchfab model credits:

lexferreira89 - Gwar Gura, Watson Amelia, Takanashi Kiara and Mori Callope model

Welloy - Chibi Baelz model

Hasksoft - IRyS model

Other credits:

Paulor94 - Main creator of this fangame

Notovia (Zaster) - Original creator of "I'm on observation duty"

Abc-Guy - Made a gamepage thumbnail

This game was made with a bunch of Unity free assets so most assets aren't belongs to me. All credits for the model go to their respective owners. (There's too many of them so I can't list them here. Sorry.)

Some pictures in the game are from Google.
